annotations.description: It's really a stretch to call this a guilty pleasure. This frozen Daiquiri isn't just ANY frozen daiquiri as put forth by TGI Fridays, but as imagined by the...
annotations.title: Tackling Our Guilty Pleasures....With A Frozen Strawberry Daiquiri

textContent:
2.5oz (75ml) White Rum
1.5oz (45ml) Strawberry Puree
1oz (30ml) Lime Juice
1oz (30ml) Simple Syrup
Top Sweetened Heavy Cream (Hand Whipped)
Mint Sprig Garnish

Blend with about a cup of crushed ice. 
Top with cream and garnish. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gZBhJMAfWqw
title: Frozen Strawberry Daiquiri
